NF.Q: In the column Hotels of the sankey chart, which nodes have an outflow exceeded 3277? Please list the node labels and their corresponding outflow values.

NF.Q: In the sankey chart, which links have a flow between 574 and 876? Please list the source node, target node, and their corresponding flow values.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Boutique Hotel to node Transportation and from node Transportation to node Leisure, which path has a larger flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Transportation} to node {Leisure} is larger.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Transportation to node Leisure and from node Accommodation to node Medical, which path has a larger flow?

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Resort to node Shopping, from node Business Hotel to node Accommodation, and from node Shopping to node Religious Pilgrimage, which path has the largest flow?

MSR.Q: Which node in the column Hotels of the sankey chart is the most critical?

MSR.Q: What is the path with the highest total flow from source node Resort to target node Medical? Please list all node labels along this path.
